description: Serialization of the Puppet catalog for a given node
title: Catalog

___time.description: When the message was sent. In ISO 8601 format with 9 characters second-fragment

___tags.description: The strings with which the source is tagged

___line.description: The line number in the manifest file which triggered the log message.

___file.description: The pathname of the manifest file which triggered the log message.

___source.description: The origin of the log message. This could be a resource, a property of a resource, or the string 'Puppet'.

___logs.description: The log messages that occured during the catalog compilation.
